Personal Profile  
An ambitio us, committed and highly driven individual with ample experience and knowledge in sales, operations and project 
management. Currently seeking a challenging position that would allow for the demonstration of substantial organisational 
skills, remarkable administrative qualities, and  extensive management knowledge. GCC, MENA experience . 
 
 
Education  
 
1987 - 1991  American College in London  (England, United Kingdom)    
B.A. Interior Design  
 
1984 - 1986   HIGHSCHOOL Modern tutorial collage  (England, United Kingdom ) 
 
 
Professional  Experience  
 
2012 - Present  Country Manager - MB Alghalib Petroleum L.L.C (Basrah, Iraq)  
 Successfully completed the registration of a new branch in Iraq while ensuring  appropriate 
measures were implemented for its effective running. Overlooked and managed the 
import of 2X 1000HP workover rigs into the co untry. Major clients acquired include SLB, 
Baker Hues , Haliburton, Lukoil and ENI.  Skills developed  include the  ability to manage, 
lead and delegate to a team of over 120 workers; tailoring negotiations and contracts to 
procure major clients; and meeting timeframes and deadlines efficiently.  
 
2009 – 2012     General Manager  - Drillmec Italy S.P.A Iraq  (Basrah, Iraq)  
 Procured a substantive governmental contract in leading  the sale  of over 30 oil  drilling rigs 
to the Iraqi Ministry of Oil. The rigs were expertly assembled, rigged up, commissioned 
and handed over to the Iraqi Drilling Company and other IOCs.  Resulted in gaining 
proficiency in dealing with NOCs as well as IOCs; competency in adhering to budgets; 
and extensive experience in handling a large team.  
 
2008 - 2009  General Manager – TAK Mining ( Mozambique, Africa)  
Obtained governmental concessions that allowed for the p rospecting for minerals in 
various parts of Mozambique.  Took charge in deploying teams of geologists using land 
and air transportation  to collect rock/soil samples for further inve stigation. Skills acquired  
include a dequately  facilitating communication and coordination with headquarters and 
mining labs in South Africa; general core drilling ; and knowledge of the mining industry.   
 
2006 - 2008  Managing Director – Dofhar Nutraceuticals  (Salalah, Sultanate of Oman)  
 Supervised the research and development of certain nutraceuticals , including the 
oversight of their filling lines in Salalah’s free -zone.  Built up skills such as f ine and sharp 
attention to detail to ensure the smooth  operation of the filling lines.  
 
1999 – 2006    Founder/ Owner/General Manager  – Original Signs & Graphics (London, England)  
Founded and managed a sign manufacturing company.  Duties entailed consistent 
monitoring of the company’ s progress against set goals, as well as  managing and 
directing the sales team, production levels, development and design.  Also designed and 
manufactured an innovative product.  Abilities procured compri se systematic monitoring 

skills; the knowledge and expertise of running a business; and managing heavy workloads 
through delegating tasks below to increase employee morale.  
 
1995 – 1999    Owner/Sales Director – A&S Signs Ltd (London, England)  
Developed and  implemented sales and marketing plans; set and accomplished sales 
goals, budgets and forecasts; hired, trained and mentored the sales team; worked in close 
partnership with the managers to improve services and customer satisfaction.  
 
1992 – 1995    Managin g Director – Sign Masters Ltd (London, England)  
Increased levels of turnover; prepared annual production plans  that obtained the approval 
of the Production Director; coordinated with the Sales Managers to plan production 
capacities according to yearly sales projections; monitored production in comparison to 
sales to review the production schedule accordingly; ensu red there existed enough 
replenishments to cov

Seek mentorship from senior team members
